title: Sleepy Soraka

embed.description: decided to line and color an old sketch I had! sleepy raka

body: cleaned up an old sketch I did a long while back, colored it and made it pretty!

replies.body: This is so cute, thanks for sharing!! :D
Think you could drop the idea to the skins team to make more skins with champs wearing pajamas?

agree.
pls start with Banana in Pajamas Soraka
yes! a bear kigu for volibear!

Rito PLS!!!!!!
thank you, and no problem! I'm glad you like it!
